mapper.select: SELECT sed.send_d_id, sem.send_code, sed.box_code, sed.package_barcode,sed.pickup_code, sed.waybill_code, sem.send_type,sem.create_site_code, sem.receive_site_code, sem.operate_time,sem.update_time, sem.create_user, sed.is_cancel,sem.create_user_code,sem.yn From DMS.send_d sed Inner Join DMS.send_m sem On sed.box_code = sem.box_code and sed.receive_site_code= sem.receive_site_code and sed.create_site_code= sem.create_site_code where sed.sendd_status=0 and sem.create_Time <= timestampadd(minute, -10, now()) and sed.create_Time >= timestampadd(DAY, -2, now()) and mod(sed.send_d_id,8) in ${queueId} LIMIT 500
select distinct waybill_code from dms.send_d where box_code=#{boxCode} and yn=1
select send_code,box_code,package_barcode from DMS.send_d where yn = 1 and waybill_code = #{waybillCode} order by create_time desc limit 1
